## CONST

Constant definitons

## Game

Game

### Parameters

-   `opt` **type** options (optional, default `options.default`)

### scores

Returns **[Array][51]&lt;integer>** [0]=number of empty fields, [1]=number of user fields, [2]=number of computer fields

### scoreUser

Returns **integer** number of user fields

### scoreComputer

Returns **integer** number of computer fields

### size

Returns **[object][52]** {x,y} board size

### gameOver

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### executeUserTurn

#### Parameters

-   `line` **(Line | [number][54] | integer)** , see <a href="#gamecheckline">checkLine</a>
-   `player` **integer**  (optional, default `this.player`)
-   `level` **integer**  (optional, default `this.level`)

Returns **integer** score for turn

### executeAutoTurn

#### Parameters

-   `player` **integer**  (optional, default `this.player`)
-   `level` **integer**  (optional, default `this.level`)

Returns **integer** score for turn

### executeSingleTurn

internal turn

#### Parameters

-   `line` **(Line | [number][54] | integer)** , see <a href="#gamecheckline">checkLine</a>
-   `player` **integer** 

Returns **integer** score for turn

### saveGame

store actual game on stack

### restoreGame

restore last game from stack

### isSaved

check if restoreGame() is possible
returns {boolean}

### checkLine

#### Parameters

-   `value` **(Line | [number][54] | integer)** 

#### Examples

```javascript
checkLine( 2 );                // return line with id=2
checkLine( "2" );              // return line with id=2
var line = board.boxAtPos(1,1).lines.left;
checkline( line );             // returns left line of box[1,1]
checkLine( "1 1 left" );       // returns left line of box[1,1]
```

Returns **any** Line

## Board

Board

### Parameters

-   `size` **[object][52]** {x,y} (optional, default `options.default.size`)

### clone

Returns **[object][52]** copy of game

### get2d

### getScores

Returns **[Array][51]&lt;integer>** [0]=number of empty fields, [1]=number of user fields, [2]=number of computer fields

### executeSingleTurn

set line for player and possible complete the box, no checks done

#### Parameters

-   `line` **(Line | [number][54] | integer)** @link {#checkline}
-   `player` **integer** 

## Box

Object to describing one board cell

### Parameters

-   `id` **integer** of box
-   `pos` **[object][52]** {x,y}

### id

#### Properties

-   `id` **integer** of box

### pos

#### Properties

-   `pos` **[object][52]** {x,y}

### lines

#### Properties

-   `line` **[object][52]** {left,top,right,bottom}

### owner

#### Properties

-   `owner` **integer** of box

### isComplete

Returns **[Boolean][53]** true if all lines set

### isCompleteIfLine

#### Parameters

-   `line` **integer** 

Returns **[Boolean][53]** true if all lines set except this one in parameter

## constructor

### Parameters

-   `id` **type** 

## isSet

Returns **[boolean][53]** has it a owner

## score

Returns **integer** 

## describe

Returns **[string][55]** 

## side

returns {Line} the neighbour line

## Pos

Pos

### Parameters

-   `x` **type** 
-   `y` **type** 

### Examples

```javascript
new Pos(1,2);
new Pos('1','2')
new Pos({x:1,y:2})
```

### describe

Returns **[string][55]**
